boardgame.name: Himmelveil Sewers
boardgame.description:
From the publisher's website:

Himmelveil Sewers is the foundational, fantasy sewer infrastructure setting you’ve been dreaming of (if you dream of sewers that is...gross!)! A setting of previously unheard of modularity and flexibility, two years in the making!

Utilizing WorldWorksGames exclusive TerrainlinX system, Sewers allows you to create true multi-leveled sewer layouts which sit below Himmelveil Streets! Layouts can be built to any configuration and to any height. This isn’t just static boxes and inflexibly structured building shapes; this is a reusable tool-set and an endless torrent of possibilities in all shapes, sizes and dimensions. And best of all, when you’re done everything stores flat!

It almost seems silly to mention this in passing but Himmelveil Sewers is also automated craft cutter friendly! An industry first for this type of terrain product!

Beneath the bustling streets of Himmelveil is a murky world of twisting tunnels and foul odours. A refuge for thieves, cutthroats and worse and a highway for contraband, this dank domain is home to some of the most deadly dangers any would-be adventurers are ever likely to face. Better keep your wits about you... if the stink doesn't get you, the rats surely will...

The ultimate companion set to Streets of Himmelveil, Himmelveil Sewers contains:

* Long angled wall in flat and our exclusive Anti-Warp format
* 6 varieties of corner posts

boardgame.name: Asara
boardgame.description:
In Asara, you take on the role of a wealthy builder competing to bring the most prestige to your name through constructing the largest and most ornate towers in the city. The game is played over 4 rounds (years), during which you will be acquiring the pieces for your towers and assembling them.

Players are given a hand of cards with different colors. On their turn, players play a card from their hand to an action space on the board. These spaces allow players to acquire tower pieces, get money, build a portion of their towers, etc. Once a card has been played in one of the action spaces on the board, all subsequent cards played in that area have to follow the original card’s color. Turns continue around the table until all players are out of cards for that round.

Scoring happens at the end of each round based on the number of towers a player has and the ornamentation present on those towers. After the scoring at the end of round 4, a final scoring occurs and bonus prestige points are given to the players with the largest towers of each color, the most towers, and the largest tower overall. The player with the most prestige points is the winner.

boardgame.name: Himmelveil Canals
boardgame.description:
From the publisher's website:

The fantasy city of Himmelveil NEEDS WATER!!! No medieval, Victorian or even modern European setting is complete without canals! Weave waterways through your village or city street layout, create expansive waterfront harbor settings complete with elevated docks and boardwalks, or stack your canal system to create tiered locks, subterranean street flows and dramatic waterfalls! Dozens of expertly crafted modular TerrainlinX tiles from veteran terrain designer Denny Unger, help you create a nearly unlimited variety of watery infrastructure settings.

Not only that but we’ve included harbor walls, dock walls, unique outlets and locks to enclose, elevate or submerge your canal and harbor layouts!!!

Taking advantage of our smash hit TerrainlinX build system, your layouts are no longer limited by restrained, static "shoebox" design but are fully on-the-fly modular and expansive in every dimension! With automated "robocutting" support (Craftrobo & Silhouette SD compatible) and complete cross compatibility with other TerrainlinX settings, this is another must have addition for any TLX collector looking to expand their build potential!

Himmelveil Canals Includes all of the following:

· 26 custom designed canal tiles covering: canals, boardwalks, 3" & 6" elevated docks, open water, harbor settings. Comes complete in 1", 1.5" and No Grid formats! Utilizes WWG’s unobtrusive organic grid system (natural elements make the grid).

· 3" and 6" dock railing

· 1", 1.5" & 3" wide dock stairs

· 6" Walls: Bay walls, Posted dock walls, Timber dock walls, Flood gate wall, Closed Lock wall, Cascading Sculptured outflow walls.

· 3" Walls: Dock walls, Bay walls.

· 2, 3 & 4-Way Posts in dock and bay formats.

· TerrainlinX mounting templates

· Full GSD automated cutting support and cutting templates.

· And as always, detailed instructions and easy to follow guides.

boardgame.name: Battles: The Knights
boardgame.description:
Fast and easy to learn tactical wargame about medieval battles.

It is a card driven game, with historical leaders, cavalry charges and countercharges, infantry defending in fortified terrain, crossbow fire and bombardment, and much more. The unique combat system and a new way to visualize the battlefield makes this game a new quality in the world of the tactical wargames.

There are many scenarios in the base game, concerning battlefields of the:
- Wars of the Roses,
- Wars of Scottish Independence,
- Hundred Years' War.

The modular board and cube-based way to visualize troops on the battlefield, let players to create an infinite number of scenarios of the whole medieval era.

Thanks to the "play and learn" rulebook composition, this game can be played with equal pleasure by two experienced players, as well as by a father and son.

boardgame.name: Irish Quest
boardgame.description:
When times are tough, as indeed they are just now, gather your friends and family around the table and cosy up for a few hours of traditional fun with Irish Quest. Together you can rediscover your Irish roots and the family values that really matter when you play Irish Quest. An ideal way to spend quality time together. Be Irish and proud of it!

Your Country, Your Heritage, Your Passion

Test your knowledge of everything Irish and learn so much more by playing Irish Quest. With over 2,000 Irish multiple-choice questions in four different categories HISTORY, LAND AND NATURE, CULTURE and MODERN there’s so much to share and learn, and the accompanying booklet enhances the experience with further explanations for many of the more interesting and unusual answers. But beware! As you tour the country to collect the letters ‘Q U E S T’, Destiny cards may help or hinder you and you will need to earn sovereigns to help pay your way.
